title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 August 2012 - XWiki
content:

10:54 <+sburjan> Hello. Due to a failed upgrade, we lost agent 7 and agent 8 are lost. I will have to re-install and re-create them from scratch. I think I will do this tomorrow, because Alex is not yet ready installing the host oS

14:53 <CIA-114> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5 \* ra833a9c https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/a833a9c4f1e243e1ee7986e1a67b4811dbca28e2 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-annotations/xwiki-platform-annotation-ui/src/main/resources/AnnotationCode/Script.xml : XWiki.currentPage is already set by javascript.vm. Also, the meta HTML element is not present in portlet mode. - http://git.io/tgNIZQ  
14:53 <CIA-114> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5 \* r4b3ed1c https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/4b3ed1c61973a64ddf6034bce0693c3627a1ae16 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/pom.xml : Repackage yuicompressor so that we can use the latest version of Rhino (yuicompressor uses modified classes of an older version of Rhino). - http://git.io/yRn2jA  
14:53 <CIA-114> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5 \* r5554cfc https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/5554cfcd377ef8b89b7e8e80e5e088a02a9a8e66 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-search/xwiki-platform-search-lucene/pom.xml : Repackage boilerpipe so that we can use the latest version of NekoHTML (boilerpipe bundles 2 modified? classes from an older version of NekoHTML). - http://git.io/EZgF3A  
14:53 <CIA-114> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5 \* rdcb23de https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/dcb23de9a20d5dbe2faaf5dfcf2fe0dca7ee0317 / (6 files in 3 dirs): Setup the XWiki Portlet. - http://git.io/DazTkA  
14:53 <CIA-114> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5 \* rc7bb520 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/c7bb520977da2200e96ce0b81c8e7ca5bf133898 / (2 files in 2 dirs): Make the AJAX behaviour of comments work in portlet mode (work in progress). - http://git.io/U0dz1Q

15:56 <jvdrean> has quit  
15:56 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
16:01 <CIA-114> tmortagne feature-portlet-3.5.x \* r4310221 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/4310221acc11094c61329626c96edaf4b3afd5c9 / (47 files in 47 dirs): Set custom version (so that it can be deployed without overriding stable-3.5.x branch artefacts) - http://git.io/paVRSQ  
16:15 <CIA-114> tmortagne feature-portlet-3.5.x \* r57c4faa https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/57c4faadf648416a46aac7f9b0dd4dfe51ff923e / pom.xml : Update enterprise.version property - http://git.io/P6Y8qQ  
16:15 <CIA-114> tmortagne feature-portlet-3.5.x \* rcb8573f https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/cb8573f3e9964b27269ab1d1831e63652ae3025d / pom.xml : Update platform.version property - http://git.io/-nKFHQ  
16:26 <vmassol> jvdrean: can we hide a space? (I don't recall) or just pages?  
16:29 <+jvdrean> vmassol: only pages, spaces "disappear" when they contain only hidden pages  
16:29 <vmassol> ok that's what I thought, thnaks  
16:29 <vmassol> so if a user wants to make the main space hidden it's not very easy  
16:29 <vmassol> he has to manually hide all pages  
16:30 <+jvdrean> yes  
16:30 <+jvdrean> my take about this is that hiding spaces is mostly for developers willing to hide code spaces  
16:31 <vmassol> jvdrean: check the last mail on the list  
16:31 <Denis> has quit  
16:31 <vmassol> if I were an end user  
16:31 <vmassol> and creating a new wiki  
16:31 <vmassol> I'd love to have an "empty" wiki  
16:31 <vmassol> ie no spaces/no pages ecisting  
16:31 <vmassol> (but all the features there)  
16:32 <vmassol> s/ecisting/existing/  
16:32 <+jvdrean> I'd love that too :)  
16:32 <vmassol> ok
